title: Secure this 1bd1ba Today! Specials avail for Limited Time!
posting_body: ['Beautifully renovated 1 bedroom/1 bath apartment homes now available; Our Stanley property is conveniently located in the Citrus Grove neighborhood of Glendale and features a swimming pool and barbecue area for residents in a beautiful courtyard setting.', '\xa0\xa0Interior renovations include luxury plank flooring in the living areas, new plush carpeting in the bedrooms, all new stainless-steel appliances including refrigerator, gas range, microwave and dishwasher; beautiful stone granite countertops in the kitchen and bathrooms, new cabinets and fixtures throughout; as well as central air conditioning and heat with digital programmable Nest thermostat.', 'CALL TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING!', '-Assigned Off Street Parking', '-Laundry', 'On-Site', '-Recycling', '-Ceiling Fans', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Garbage Disposal', '-Close to Public Transportation', '-Easy Access to World Class Shopping & Dining', '-Luxury Plank Flooring', '-Plush', 'Carpeting', '-Modern Fixtures', '-Controlled Access/Gated', '-On-Site Management & Maintenance', '-Central A/C', '-Online Resident Portal', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
